definitions.definition: buy and sell goods and services.
synonyms: run "he made his fortune trading in beaver pelts"operate
do business "the business is trading at a loss"

definitions.definition: buy or sell (a particular item or product).
examples: she has traded millions of dollars' worth of metals

definitions.definition: (especially of shares or currency) be bought and sold at a specified price.
examples: the dollar was trading where it was in January

definitions.definition: exchange (something) for something else, typically as a commercial transaction.
examples: they trade mud-shark livers for fish oil
synonyms: trade in "I traded the old machine for a newer model"

definitions.definition: give and receive (something, typically insults or blows).
transfer (a player) to another club or team.
